column4: basically universe is all from debian- with minimal or no changes. main & restricted are debian packages that are worked on by ubuntu and supported. multiverse includes packages not in debian repositories. overall, ubuntu has everything debian has and a few more like mplayer
go to packages.ubuntu.com and search yourself

backports and hoary-extras has more backages. backports has some packages from breezy which didn't get into hoary and extras has stuff that couldn't be included for legal reasons likelibdvdcss2, w32codecs
